name: World In the Sky
description:
A game created for a personal game jam.

Theme: "A World In The Skies"

This is a two-player game that requires two computers on the same internet network.

A card game where you have to use your cards to spawn allies to take down the enemy's crystal. 

If the IP Address doesn't show up correctly, you can get it from clicking on your windows button, click cmd then in the prompt type ipconfig and look for the ipv4, that'll be your IP address to allow people to connect to you
